content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: magma_block
inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone_pressure_plate", "quantity": 6, "index": 10}, {"type": "fletching_table", "quantity": 48, "index": 12}, {"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 4, "index": 15}, {"type": "dark_oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "bowl", "quantity": 34, "index": 17}, {"type": "birch_fence", "quantity": 16, "index": 19}, {"type": "pumpkin_pie", "quantity": 27, "index": 20}, {"type": "beetroot", "quantity": 27, "index": 21}, {"type": "sandstone_wall", "quantity": 13, "index": 22}, {"type": "warped_sign", "quantity": 10, "index": 23}, {"type": "chainmail_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 4, "index": 25}, {"type": "blaze_spawn_egg", "quantity": 61, "index": 30}, {"type": "white_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "red_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 14, "index": 33}, {"type": "item_frame", "quantity": 50, "index": 39}, {"type": "jungle_sign", "quantity": 15, "index": 41}, {"type": "infested_chiseled_stone_bricks", "quantity": 53, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft a magma_block, I first need to craft 4 magma_creams. To craft a magma_cream, I need to place a slime_ball and a blaze_powder side by side in the crafting grid. The only slime_ball is at slot 15, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
